channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 13:16 Driven the alarm to the Donetsk region.Creb
item.description: 游릭 13:16 Driven the alarm to the Donetsk region.Creb This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
